io.github.steviebeenz.nope.modules.actions

Class ActionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.steviebeenz.nope.modules.AbstractModule
      • io.github.steviebeenz.nope.modules.actions.ActionManager

  • public class ActionManager
extends AbstractModule
    Action Manager is the primary class for loading and executing actions for when a player flags a specific check
    Author:
    imodm
